description.narrative: The Overall Development Objective of the Transport Sector Modernization Program (TSMP) is to improve transport connectivity of the country along priority transport links and to support improvements in transport operations and asset management practices. The Program is multi-phased with a First Phase including road sections in the Federation of Bosnia and Hezegovina, and the Second Phase including railways in the Republika Srpska.The Development Objective of the Second Phase of the TSMP is to improve the operational efficiency and financial sustainability of the railways in Republika Srpska.
